Uses of Interface
ca.ualberta.CMPUT301W15T06.Listener

    • Uses of Listener in ca.ualberta.CMPUT301W15T06

      Methods in ca.ualberta.CMPUT301W15T06 with parameters of type Listener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void AppModel.addListener(Listener l)
      This method allows user to add a Listener to the ArrayList listeners
      void Item.addListener(Listener l) 
      void ClaimList.addListener(Listener l)
      This method allows user to add a Listener to the ArrayList listeners and also add listener to each claim in this claimList
      void Claim.addListener(Listener l)
      This method allows user to add a Listener to the ArrayList listeners and add listener to destinations and items in this claim
      void AppModel.addModelListener(Listener l)
      This method allows user to add a Listener to the modelListeners if the model does not contains a Listener l
      void Item.addModelListener(Listener l) 
      void Claim.addModelListener(Listener l)
      This method allows user to add a Listener to the ArrayList ModelListeners and add listener to destinations and items in this claim
      void AppModel.removeListener(Listener l)
      This method allows user to remove a Listener from the listeners ArrayList.
      void AppModel.removeModelListener(Listener l)
      This method is designed to remove a Listener from the modelListeners ArrayList
